channel.title: Alarm on The Streamliners
channel.description: Recent content in Alarm on The Streamliners

item.title: Implementing Alarm manager
item.description: How to implement an alarm in your android application using AlarmManager? Android AlarmManager allows you to access system alarm. With the help of AlarmManager in android, you can schedule your application to run at a specific time in the future. AlarmManager is a bridge between application and Android system alarm service. It can send a broadcast to your app (which can be completely terminated by user) at a scheduled time and your app can then perform any task accordingly.
